articles.description: Mike Tyson will face Jake Paul in a boxing match July 20 at AT&T Stadium in Arlington, Texas, in the main event of a card that will air on Netflix, officials told ESPN.
articles.content:
Jake Paul rose to combat sports fame when he knocked out former NBA player Nate Robinson on the undercard of Mike Tyson's exhibition boxing match with Roy Jones Jr. in 2020.

articles.title: Star from Afghanistan's first-ever ODI calls time on international career - ICC Cricket
articles.description: The 35-year-old Noor Ali Zadran decided to call time on his storied international career.
articles.content:
Afghanistan's ODI cap No.9, Noor Ali Zadran, has bid adieu to international cricket on Thursday after two Test matches, 51 ODIs and 23 T20Is.
